current workers are located. In a speech Tuesday, Eric Schmidt said Google Inc. will hire more than 1,000 workers in Europe this year. All told, Google Inc. has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google Inc. 's senior vice president of engineering and research. Even if it surpasses 31,000 employees this year, Google Inc. will still have far fewer people than Microsoft Corp., among its fiercest rival.

At practice Wednesday, Michael Vick loosened up throwing passes to Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan, who is making his first Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. Matt is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time, he said.`` I like what they're doing in the offense and it's been easy. long supported the Tunisian leader, seeing him as a bulwark against Islamic militants in the region. In 2006, then-US defence secretary Donald Rumsfeld , speaking in Tunis, praised the country's evolution. What they have done it seems to me is move from a colony in 50 years- a relatively short period of time- to a democratic country that in different areas is moving at a different pace, he said. The US administration, like France and the European Union, never called for Zine El Abidine Ben Ali to go. Indeed, on January 12- just two days before he fled- State Department

deputy, Dick Cheney Armitage, also comes in for his share of knocks. Donald Rumsfeld takes particular offense at Colin Powell 's contention that he was misled by faulty intelligence into making the public case for the invasion of Iraq. Colin Powell was not duped or misled by anybody, Donald Rumsfeld writes.`` Nor did he lie about Saddam Hussein 's suspected WMD stockpiles. The president did not lie. The vice president did not lie.( CIA Director President Bush ) Tenet did not lie. Condoleezza Rice did
